rules_text: Reveal the top five cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Exile one of those piles. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards. Shuffle the other pile into your library.
flavor_text:
[i]You should have been gone from here years ago. 
You should be living a different life.[/i]
notes: True Trans Soul Rebel — Against Me!
